name: GalaxyNG Web Site
short_description: This is a Module for the CMS System phpWebSite. It is used to host GalaxyNG Game Servers. GalaxyNG is a Play by EMail (PbEM) galactic strategy Game. Should also work fine for all other types of Galaxy PbEM derivates.
